jumbofurnace.jumbo_furnace_info_tooltip: Place 27 furnaces in a 3x3x3 cube to create the Jumbo Furnace
jumbofurnace.jumbo_furnace_upgrade_info: The above item(s) can be placed in the upgrade slot of a Jumbo Furnace to increase the number of recipes it can smelt per cooking cycle.
jumbofurnace.advancements.story.assemble: Place 27 furnaces in a 3x3x3 cube to create the Jumbo Furnace
jumbofurnace.advancements.story.obtain_j: Create a Jumbo Furnace item (possibly by smelting 27 furnaces in a Jumbo Furnace)
jumbofurnace.advancements.story.upgrade_: Upgrade your Jumbo Furnace with a Jumbo Furnace
jumbofurnace.advancements.story.fully_up: Fully upgrade a Jumbo Furnace with a full stack of 64 Jumbo Furnaces
